text: deviyan pratiksepa kalavun niraya veta kandayam vasayen meheyava gena yanu læbe. ovuhu e dakva pæmini vita ehi doratu vivrta karanu læbe. numbalage paramadhipatige vadan parayanaya karana daham dutavarun numbala aturin numbala veta nopæminiye da? tavada numbalage mema dinaye hamuva pilibanda numbalata avavada nokale dæ?yi ehi bharakaruvan ovungen vimasanu æta. eseya. yæyi ovuhu pavasati. enamut deviyan pratiksepa kalavun veta danduvame prakasaya niyama viya
